column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////This place had neither good food nor good service! I wanted to show my girls how good deep dish pizza was but this was a huge disappointment.  Pizza took forever
column2: we were there for around 3 hrs.  The "place your order while your are waiting for a table" is BS.  We still wAited an hour after we sat down.  Pizza was burned
column4: all the toppings fell off.  Don't believe the ratings
column5: this place is terrible.  Don't waste your time!
